channel.title: HELP (562) adding new npc's they dont show?!?
channel.description: hey all, when i try to add a new npc on a 562 it does not show im putting this: [code]<npc><id>584</id><location><x>3164</x><y>3485</y><z>0</z></location></npc>[/code] in npc.txt but then compile, yeah that works but when i log on it does not show? any ideas (p.s im a noob for RSPS atm so this might sound bit dull but idc cause i need to find out whats wrong) oh and btw im using pkzevolution 562 source before anyone asks :| EDIT* Nvm i figured out myself ty anyway :)

item.title: HELP (562) adding new npc's they dont show?!?
item.dc:creator: @djbaird6 djbaird6
item.description:
@djbaird6 wrote:

kk ty but worked out self 2 npc folders yes 1 xml (lol i is dumb :L) pasted it in and bam spawned ty though

Read full topic
